name: John Doe
text: Great product! It exceeded my expectations. I would highly recommend it.

name: Jane Smith
text: Not bad, but there are some improvements needed. I'll give it 3 stars.

name: Mike Johnson
text: This is the worst product I've ever purchased. 1 star is too much!

name: Sarah Wilson
text: Decent quality for the price. I'm giving it 4 stars.

name: David Brown
text: A solid product with a fair price. I'll rate it 4 stars.

name: Lisa Miller
text: Mediocre at best. 2 stars from me.

name: Robert Davis
text: This product is a game-changer! 5 stars without a doubt.

name: Emily Taylor
text: Not what I expected. 2 stars for the disappointment.

name: Daniel Lee
text: Impressive quality and design. It deserves a perfect 5-star rating.

name: Olivia Moore
text: Terrible experience. I'd give it 1 star if I could give zero.
